description:
cmd/go/build: Add magic data for Plan 9 binaries.

This change allows the Go build and install tools to
recognize Plan 9 i386 and amd64 binaries.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org, r@golang.org, rminnich@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1da9d40e38ab ***

cmd/go/build: Add magic data for Plan 9 binaries.

This change allows the Go build and install tools to
recognize Plan 9 i386 and amd64 binaries.

R=rsc, r, rminnich
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 6575064: cmd/go/build: Add magic data for Plan 9 binaries.
